'''Converting''' is a [[Crafting Method]] available at [[Crafting Benches]] to perform [[Alchemy]].

It allows players to convert materials from one type to another using a catalyst.

==Character Ascension Materials==
{{Main|Dust of Azoth}}
[[File:Item Dust of Azoth.png|100px|right]]
[[Character Ascension Material]] of the same quality can be converted into each other by using [[Dust of Azoth]]. The amount of dust need per conversion is dependent on the quality of the Elemental Gem.

==Transfigured Dreams==
{{Main|Dream Solvent}}
[[File:Item Dream Solvent.png|100px|right]]
[[Dream Solvent]] can be used to convert [[Weekly Boss]] drops for ascending talents and [[Billet]]s for [[forging]] [[weapon]]s. It can only convert between materials from the same boss or billets of the same weapon type. One Dream Solvent is needed to convert a Weekly Boss item, and two to convert a forging billet. When using [[Crafting Benches]], the conversion recipes involving Dream Solvent are listed under "Transfigured Dreams."

==Disassemble the "Maintenance Mek"==
{{Main|"Maintenance Mek" Salvaged Parts}}
[[File:Item "Maintenance Mek" Salvaged Parts.png|100px|right]]
[[Maintenance Meks]] can be converted to [["Maintenance Mek" Salvaged Parts]]. When using [[Crafting Benches]], the conversion recipes involving Maintenance Meks are listed under "Disassemble the "Maintenance Mek"."
